item.title: 路由板块
item.description: <h2 id="第一章"><a class="anchor" href="#第一章">#</a> 第一章</h2> <figure class="highlight bash"><figcaption data-lang="bash"><span>h</span></figcaption><table><tr><td data-num="1"></td><td><pre>OSPF【开放最短路径优先】（现网使用最多）</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="2"></td><td><pre><span class="token number">1</span>：动态路由协议分为：</pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="3"></td><td><pre>距离矢量路由协议<span class="token punctuation">(</span>RIP,EIGRP,BGP<span class="token punctuation">)</span></pre></td></tr><tr><td data-num="4"></td><td><pre>链路状态路由协议<span class="token punctuation">(</span>OSPF,ISIS<span class="token punctuation">)</span></pre></td></tr></table></figure>

item.title: hhh
Hello
item.description: <p>Welcome to <span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9oZXhvLmlvLw==">Hexo</span>! This is my second blog post.Author:Ruri Shimotsuki @優萌初華. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can ask me on <span class="exturl" data-url="aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL2pvY2VseW5mbG9yZXNYWFg=">GitHub</span>.</p>
